owl:Ontology.dc:description: LAC RDF vocabulary, described using W3C RDF Schema and the Web Ontology Language.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: LAC vocabulary

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Dataset
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A class to model a dataset in data lakes. A dataset contains a set of data that belong to the same domain.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Table
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A class to model tabular-like data files such as CSV and JSON.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Column
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A class to represent a column in a table class.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the two columns are semantically similar based on their names.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Semantic Similarity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the two columns have similar content based on their instances.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Content Similarity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that the content of a column is contained in otherâ€™s.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Inclusion Dependency

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates that a column is foreign key to primary key column.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: PKFK

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the different usages of the data entity resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Used in

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the different insights provided by the user on the data entity resources.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Insights

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Provides the path of the dataset or table in the file system.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Path

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Povides the total number of instances in a column.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Total Value Count

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Povides the number of different instances in a column.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Distinct Value Count

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Povides the number of missing instances in a column.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Missing Value Count

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annotates a triple to reflect how certain of an similarity,inclusion dependency, or pkfkedges to be established.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Certainty
